name: RIDE ON 2029
description:
Tribute to the great famous arcade motorcycle with this endless ride.
This is an ad support game. You can choose free ride to play a single stage or watch ad to play full 8 stages. There are 2 routes to choose from, Sun and Moon. The more you out run the rivals the more score you get.

Easy controls, just tilt and touch.
2 camera angles.
Google Play Games : leaderboards and achievements.
